channel.title: Quest place changing

item.title: Quest place changing
item.dc:creator: @metorrite metorrite
item.description:
@metorrite wrote:

hehe sorry i am a horrible explainer, ok so

  1. i added a quest
    2.i moved it from its original tab to th next tab
    3.when i click the quest its supposed to show what you should do on the scroll looking think like in runescape but its showing up where i had it before i moved it,

doesnt it have something to do with 8144, 8145, 8146, etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Quest place changing
item.dc:creator: @PvPXile PvPXile
item.description:
@PvPXile wrote:

What the fuck? From what I could understand, you’re placing it in the Quest sendframes?

Read full topic

item.title: Quest place changing
item.dc:creator: @metorrite metorrite
item.description:
@metorrite wrote:

i just added a quest and i moved where the text for it is like where it shows your progress but when i cliick where it was before the fram still shows up on there i moved it to the dungeoneering tab this is the sendframe thats showing it in my quest tab how can i change it to pop up at at 29298 (dung tab)

        c.getPA().sendFrame126("@dre@The Ritual", 8144);
        c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8145);
        if(c.nomad == 0) {
            c.getPA().sendFrame126("To start the quest, you should speak to Wilough.", 8147);
            c.getPA().sendFrame126("He can be found in the center of canafis.", 8148);
            c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8149);
        } else if(c.nomad == 1) {
            c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@To start the quest, you should speak to Wilough.", 8147);
            c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@He can be found in the center of canafis.", 8148);
            c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8149);
            c.getPA().sendFrame126("You agreed to help the boys find their parents.", 8150);
            c.getPA().sendFrame126("You should head off to taverly to see if you can find them.", 8151);
            c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8152);
        } else if(c.nomad == 2) {

            c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8170);
        } else if(c.nomad == 8) {
